verbose_text: In contrast, baseline Arc-dVenus + neurons remain easily detectable over a 1 h period given that the in vivo half-life of Arc-dVenus fluorescence is 3 h. 32 Therefore, at 1 h after fear conditioning, a high percentage of Arc-dVenus + neurons with co-localized expression of endogenous Arc would confirm that baseline Arc-dVenus + neurons are preferentially recruited during fear conditioning.
